description: Strategic guidelines for 3v3 arena combat in Wrath of the Lich King

win_condition.primary: Coordinate CC chain on Healer + Burst on Squishy

strategy.opener: Sap Healer -> Open DPS. Poly Off-DPS.
strategy.go: Kidney Shot Target + Deep Freeze Off-Target + Fear Healer.
strategy.defensive: Peel with Nova/Poly. Reset with LoS.

strategy.opener: Ride the enemy Healer or Squishiest Caster.
strategy.go: Strangulate Healer + Bladestorm + Gargoyle. UNHEALABLE DAMAGE.
strategy.defensive: Freedom Warrior. BOP DK. Defensive Stance if focused.

strategy.go: Bloodlust + Lava Burst proc + Chaos Bolt. Random one-shots.
strategy.defensive: Root/Cyclone melees. Grounding Totem critical spells.

strategy.opener: Bestial Wrath + Feral Spirit + Bloodlust + Wings.
strategy.go: Kill something in 10 seconds. If not, lose.

Melee_Cleave_vs_Caster_Cleave.plan: Rush the Casters. Do not let them set up. Kick Polys/Fears. Grounding Totem is MVP.

Caster_Cleave_vs_Melee_Cleave.plan: Triangle Formation. Spread out. Drag melees into bad positions. Punish them for chasing.
